title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 504.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 504.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part shall
apply to those individuals with responsibility for the process of determining
an appropriate placement for individuals who are currently receiving
transitional care funding, the individual receiving transitional care funding, and the individual's guardian or another individual who has been actively
involved in the care of the individual and who can represent the individual's
interests. (b) This Part shall
apply to administrative review regarding placements of individuals who are
currently receiving transitional care funding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
504.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
